AttemptToRestoreFailed.other: Restore {{.filename}} failed, `run install.sh` or `unzip agent.zip` in {{.dir}}.

BuilderProcessWasKilled.other: Builder process was killed, it may be killed by the operating system or other programs. You need to self-check and reduce the load and try again, or unzip agent.zip, restore the installation, restart the agent and try again.

DockerOnlySupportLinux.other: currently only supports linux system to use docker build machine.

DownloadDockerInitScriptError.other: failed to download docker build machine init script|{{.err}}

StatDockerInitScriptError.other: getting docker build machine init script status failed|{{.err}}

CheckDockerInitScriptAuthError.other: failed to verify and modify the permissions of the docker startup script|{{.err}}

PullLatest.other: The mirror version is latest to pull the latest version by default

StartPullImage.other: start to pull the image, image name: {{.name}}

FirstPullTips.other: [Tip] When the image is relatively large, the first pull time will be longer. You can pre-pull the image locally on the build machine to improve the pipeline startup speed.

GetPullImageLogError.other: failed to get pull image information log: {{.err}}

LocalExistImage.other: there is a mirror locally, ready to start the build environment...

ContainerExitCodeNotZero.other:
wait container {{.name}} done exit code {{.code}} not 0 
 {{.msg}}

ReadDockerMountsError.other: Failed to prepare Docker mount directory: {{.err}}

DockerImageDebugError.other: Failed to start docker image debug: {{.err}}
